name: Vcgs Toolbox
author: V√≠ctor Campuzano (vcgs)

sections.description:
Very simple plugin that includes some awesome options, features, shortcodes and scripts for make better your blogging experience. All are based on articles written by Victor Campuzano in his personal blog vicampuzano.com

At the moment, this plugin includes:

  • New! Send Events to Google Analytics every time a new comment is posted.
  • You can add a “Tweet This” link to all of your comments.
  • Add Featured Image to RSS.
  • Know Who are your best commentators in the settings pages.
  • *Scrollytics:* add a javascript code based on “Scroll Depth” to track what percentage scroll every user does on every post or page.
  • *Piopialo:* Shortcode to convert easily relevant sentences in tweetable text.
  • *Font Awesome:* Includes the Font Awesome header code to use icons on your blog posts.
  • *Bootstrap*: Includes the Bootstrap from Twitter to use ON PAGES. You can use Layouit tu build great pages using Bootstrap.
  • *Midenlace*: A simple shortcode to easy track clicks of a link on Google Analytics.
sections.installation:
1. Simply upload and install the plugin.
  2. Go to Settings->Vcgs Toolbox to activate and configure features.

  • Updated BootStrap to 3.3.1 version (This feature will be deprecated soon on Vcgs Toolbox).

1.6

1.4

1.3

1.2.5

1.2

  • Some CSS improvements

1.1

  • New Feature: you can makes piopialo in a box using new editor button or by adding boxed=”1″ as a param
  • Added new config options.

1.0.2

  • Bug Fixes:
    • Column Wordcount

1.0.1

  • I forget to include the piopialo icon üôÅ

1.0

  • Added 2 new features:

    • Find comments not replied by author. Based on “Comments Not Replied To” (Original Plugin written by Pippin Williamson, Andrew Norcross, Tom McFarlin) but with some hacks. You can find comments not replied by his author in the last month.
    • Word Count column on posts page. Adds a column on the list posts admin page wich displays the word count of each post. Useful for compare comments by post length.

  • Added TinyMCE button for Piopialo. Now, add piopialo shortcode is very easy with the Editor Button.

  • Bug Fixes

0.9

*Tested up to WordPress 3.9
*Now tracks piopialo’s links if your are enabled midenlace on the config page.

0.8

  • Added midenlace shortcode to easily track links con Google Analytics as Events. Supports both Classic and Universal Analytics

0.7

  • Added support to include Bootstrap 3 on your Blog

0.6

  • Solved issue on PHP Versions Older than 5.3.1

0.5

  • First version: includes the possibility of insert ‚ÄúFont Awesome‚Äù on your blog. It also includes Scrollytics (track scroll on your posts and pages with Google Analytics) and Piopialo (share easely your posts on facebook, twitter and Google Plus using relevant sentences).
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Simply upload and install the plugin.
  2. Go to Settings->Vcgs Toolbox to activate and configure features.
